text: Kurt Armbruster (16 September 1934 – 14 March 2019) was a Swiss footballer. He played as a midfielder. At club level, he played for Lausanne-Sport. He also played for Switzerland at the 1966 FIFA World Cup. Armbruster was born in Zürich. Armbruster died on 14 March 2019, at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1966 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from Zürich Category:Swiss footballers
title: Kurt Armbruster
